name: Birthday Present Surprise Maker - create your own presents
name_original: Birthday Present Surprise Maker - create your own presents
description:
Have you ever wanted to create your very own Birthday Present and get your family and friends to open it?
Well now you can!

Birthday Present Surprise Maker is a free super fun game where every day will feel like your birthday as you get to design and open as many birthday presents as you can open!

HOW TO PLAY

Pick a toy, then design the present box to put your toy surprise in. From the color to the paper wrapper pattern, it can all be customized.
Its not just birthday presents you can make, why not make presents for other special occasion like easter, christmas or thanksgiving.

Once you're finished with the look of your present surprise box you can then decorate it with a choice of tons of stickers. Change the color and size of stickers so you can personalises your special present.

Next is to set up the birthday room, put up balloons and banners to give the room a real birthday party feel!

Let your imagination run wild and come up with as many cute, cool, crazy ideas as you can.


FEATURES

* Lots of toy to choose from including: baby egg toy, toy monsters, toy robots, cute toy animals, video games, toy cars and much more!

* Save your favourite creations to be opened whenever you want!

* Show them off to your family and friends then get them to open it.

* Unbox it yourself like your favourite online video unboxing collectors.

Birthday Present Surprise Maker is totally free and does not contain any in-app purchases. This is the full app and all the items are unlocked.
